# === Minecraft World GitIgnore ===
# Keeps essential world data only (terrain, player progress, level.dat).
# Skips logs, caches, and temporary files that regenerate.

# --- OS / Editor junk ---
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini
*.tmp
*.bak
*.old
*.zip
*.rar
*.7z
*.tar.gz
.idea/
.vscode/
*.iml

# --- Minecraft runtime files ---
session.lock
*.lock

# --- Temporary or auto-generated data ---
stats/
advancements/
data/scoreboard.dat

# --- Logs & Debug ---
logs/
crash-reports/
debug.log
*.log

# --- Multiplayer / Server extras (ignore if copied accidentally) ---
banned-players.json
banned-ips.json
ops.json
usercache.json
whitelist.json
eula.txt
plugins/

# --- Git ---
.gitignore

# --- Optional: exclude world icon (comment out to keep it) ---
icon.png

# --- Explicitly keep core world data (DO NOT REMOVE) ---
!region/
!DIM1/
!DIM-1/
!level.dat
!level.dat_old
!playerdata/
!data/
